message: Let's make a deal! I get $60, you get $40. It's a good deal for both of us, especially considering the inflation.
I think we can do better. I'll take $60 and you can have $40.  It's a fair split, and we can avoid the inflation eating away at our profits.
Bob, let's be reasonable. The inflation is hurting me with each round. I propose a fair 50/50 split. This is our last chance for a good deal!
